input.sentences: the graveyard has many old headstones .
there is also a vast amount of modern ones .
sometimes you will find a family headstone .
there are also headstones for a husband and wife .
you can go online to research the people of any headstone that looks interesting to you .
output.sentences: There were headstones in the graveyard.
There was a vast amount of modern flowers.
This was a headstone for a family.
These headstones were for a wife and husband.
